title: The Concept of Nature in Marx - EPUB - WD
description:
ISBN: 1781681473 
Year: 2014 
Format: EPUB 
Pages: 252 pages

In The Concept of Nature in Marx, Alfred Schmidt examines humanitys relation to the natural world as understood by the great philosopher-economist Karl Marx, who wrote that human beings are part of Nature yet able to stand over against it; and this partial separation from Nature is itself part of their nature.
